createAccountNow: You can create an account now!
resetPasswordLinkSent: We have emailed your temporary password!
acceptNewsletter: I accept to receive the newsletter from this app
youAreNowRegistered: You are now registered to We Collect Diecast!
addNewItem2: Here will be a form to add an item to your collection.
addNewItem3: Several options will be available to facilitate the addition of an item and its classification.
addNewItem4: It will also be possible to add a photo to make it easier to recognize.
addNewItem5: It will be possible to put the item in "private" or "public" so that only the user can see it or not.
addNewItem6: It will be possible to put the item in your "wishlist".
addNewItem7: It will be possible to put the item to "sell", "exchange" because eventually sales will be possible on the platform version 2.0
manageCollection2: Here will be the management to manage your collection.
manageCollection3: It will be possible to modify the information of an item or delete it from its collection.
manageCollection4: It will be possible to modify the information of an item or delete it from its wishlist.
collection1: Here will be the user's collection.
collection2: It will be possible to see the items that the user owns and that he publicizes.
collection3: It will not be possible to see the items that the user owns and sets private.
collection4: A filter system will be put in place to facilitate the search.
wishlist1: Here will be the user's wishlist.
wishlist2: It will be possible to see the items that the user would like to find.
message2: Here will be a form to send a message to the user. An internal messaging system will be set up.
message3: This will avoid having to give your email address.
message4: It will be possible to see received and sent messages in the "My messages" section.
message5: This will allow you to keep track of messages sent and received.
clickHereToShareAccount: Click here to share your account with your friends!
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
passwordDontMatchRegex: The password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one letter, one number and one special character
errorCreationAccount: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again later.
yourAccountIsDeactivated: Votre compte est désactivé. Veuillez contacter l'administrateur pour plus d'informations.
errorLogin: Une erreur est survenue lors de la connexion. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.
errorUsernameOrPassword: Nom d'utilisateur ou mot de passe invalide
